title: (20302) Gipuzkoa - 919 Etorbidea Iparralde
description: Trade fair parking, which is enabled when there are some specific fairs. No services. and free

title: (20304) Irun - 12 Kostorbe Alde Kalea
description: Parking, except during sporting events. Access to the old town of Irun, services, hospitality.

title: (20303) Irun - 4 San Jose Langilea Kalea
description: Quiet street where to spend day and night. Very close to the center of Irun and 1 minute from the bus stop that takes you to Hondarribia, where they told us that ACs are not welcome and they always fine. Near drinking water and playground.

title: (20301) Irun - 0A Hendaya Kalea
description: Entrance to the ecological park site for 4 large vehicles without services but close to the town

title: (20301) Irun - 1A Playaundi Kalea
description: Car park. Small vehicle only

title: (20304) Irun - 52 Iparralde Hiribidea
description: Drinking water point located at the children's park, behind the skate park.

title: (20304) Irun - 18 Jose Antonio Loidi Bizcarrondo Kalea
title_short: (20304) Irun - 18 Jose Antonio Loidi Bizcarrondo Kalea
description: Quiet street, residences, cycle path along a watercourse and children's park with water point. Places for small motorhomes. Can stay for one night. Close to shops.

title: (20304) Irun - 29 Juan Thalamas Labandibar Kalea
description: We spent the night without any problem. No noise and in the middle of Irun Date: 02/19/2022

title: (20305) Irun - 31 Kalea Juan Thalamas Labandibar
description: Exit Irun city just before Spain behind the factory Pasquier, take the dead end road to the right and drive to the end of the road, park under the plane trees for a quiet picnic, perhaps opportunity to spend the night but the factory is a little noisy.

title: (20302) Irun - 904 Etorbidea Iparralde
description: Nice parking lot from 9:30-19:30 one has to pay, then it’s free. Close to a nice skatepark and bakeries. Good for one night

title: (20301) Irun - 903 Jaizkibel Kalea
description: Seem to be a free parking, not everywhere in level and quite busy. Where the actual parking lot is there is a 2.5m height limit but right next to it cars are parking.

title: (64700) Hendaye - 8 Rue de la Bidassoa
description: At the end of a dead end, following the parking spaces materialized. Relatively flat, only for vehicles under 7 meters. One place. Direct access to the bridge on stilts. I stayed here for one night on a Saturday night in May 2019 without being disturbed.

title: (64700) Hendaye - 3 Rue Priorenia
description: Parking along the sidewalk allowing you to cross the border to do some shopping in Spain, 300m further. No COVID check for this trip.

title: (20280) Hondarribia - 976A Lekua Barrio Amutalde
description:
Parking right by the river close to the road. The cars can be heard quietly.
No prohibitions or height restrictions.
The airport is not used much. (We did not hear any aircraft)

There is a drinking water point on the other side of the bridge.

title: (20305) Irun - 14 Teodoro Murua Kalea
description: Free parking for van or Cc less than 3.5T. No bans so far.

title: (20280) Hondarribia - 28 Gabarrari Kalea
description: It is a truck parking area. We parked the AC for the day to visit Hondarribia and we had no problem. There is a bike path to go along the coast and reach the Hondarribia beach.

title: (20305) Irun - 903 Lekua Meaka Auzoa
description: Picnic area, playground and quiet hospitality for children. Not possible to recharge in drinking water.

title: (20305) Irun - 933 Lugar Barrio Behobia
description: Parking allowed day and night. No services. Mountain View. Little passage of vehicles. Quiet place with vegetation and birdsong. Residential area.

title: (20305) Irun - 1 Gazteluzahar Ibilbidea
description: Place to park and spend the night. 1 minute from the L3 bus line to go downtown

title: (64700) Hendaye - 2 Rue Lekueder
description: Parking 10 places next to a non-paying laundromat, in the shade from 11 a.m. and authorized at night for camping because the beach is a 30-minute walk away, 15 by bike, noise from 8 a.m. you want to profit. Besides a lot of fast food trade ect ...

title: (20305) Irun - 15 Antxotxipi Kalea
description: Parking right next to the Repsol gas station, shopping center with restaurant and cafeteria, quiet to spend the night by car or motorhome!!

title: (20280) Hondarribia - 7 Gabarrari Kalea
description: Parking on the outskirts of the city, without services, level but gravel ground. In a moment you can reach the center and visit the city.

name: Laverie Revolution Laundry
title: (64700) Laverie Revolution Laundry
description:
Self-service outdoor laundromat from Revolution Laundry, available 24/7* on a supermarket or a gas station parking. Useful to do your laundry while running errands! It’s possible to receive a text message 5min before the end of the washing cycle.
For more washing advice, visit our website: www.revolution-laundry.com
*According to the opening times of the place

title: (20280) Hondarribia - 7 Gabarrari Kalea
description: The municipal police inform: you can park and spend the night a) where the spaces are delimited by paint, without exceeding this (5 m) b) where parking is allowed and there is no delimitation with paint. In this street, Gabarri, we parked our 7.10m AC to visit the town and spent the night. A very quiet place and close to the center. No problem with the local police.

title: (20305) Irun - 26 Behobia Auzoa
description: In the heart of Mount San Marcial in Irún, next to the cantina where they give a menu.  Picnic with wooden tables and benches and plenty of space to enjoy.  Two large parking spaces. Only point of water access is walking and refilling bottles as you cannot get van close enough to use. Gentle slopes but one good almost flat spot.

title: (64700) Hendaye - Rue Caneta
description: Quiet corner, next to the port, car, van is welcome, very nice view of the sea

title: (20305) Irun - 102 Barrio Meaka
description: Parking next to a restaurant

title: (20305) Irun - 17 Pozuetakogaina Kalea
description: Parking of a supermarket, two floors you loved outdoors, we parked in the lower one since there was room to maneuver, the upper beach has a very very narrow entrance! right next to a gas station, very wide and large parking lot (30 spaces).

title: (20280) Hondarribia - 1 Molla Ibilbidea
description: Flat parking (white line) in El Puntal de Hondarribia. There is a bike path on one side and a two-way road on the other, little traffic though. Right in front, there is a small promenade towards the marina and, in the background, views of Hendaye. Difficulty grooming and going to the bathroom.

title: (64700) Hendaye - 30 Boulevard du Général de Gaulle
title_short: (64700) Hendaye - 30 Boulevard du Général de Gaulle
description: Laundry with nice owner. Gets nice and clean and dry too

title: (20280) Hondarribia - 2 Erribera-Behera Kalea
description: Free parking right next to the entrance to the old town of Hondarribia. It is in a grove. Not suitable for AC or very large vans.

title: (20305) Irun - 27 Behobia Auzoa
description: 5 large parking lots with steep slopes on concrete. Very little shade. Good solution if there is no other place in the immediate vicinity. The climb to get there is not trivial. Road with little traffic. At this time of the year there are no signs and no prohibitions. Great for trucks within 7 meters.

title: (20305) Irun - 86 Letxumborro Hiribidea
description: Point to rest if the afternoon night falls on you. It's free and quiet.

title: (20280) Hondarribia - 9 Harresilanda Kalea
description: Automatic Laundry (Eco Laundry) machines are all new, it is very well located next to a large supermarket.

title: (20280) Hondarribia - 30 Jaitzubia Auzoa
description: Parking to rest. On Sunday, some "locals" for the walk.

title: (20305) Irun - 27 Euskadi Plaza
description: Free parking, ideal for one night. Just after the bridge between Hendaye and Irun. Lovely spot all the duty free shops there is a fee 2  3 euros for 24 hrs pay at ticket machine. No amenities.

title: (20305) Irun - 27 Behobia Auzoa
description: Small parking next to a play area with table, very quiet ....

title: (64700) Hendaye -
description: Rustige plaats niet ver van het water

title: (64700) Hendaye - D912
description: Free parking 2m a full day come more in the evening to find a place

title: (20280) Hondarribia - 116 Biteri Kalea
description: We spent 2 nights here, without problem, with an AC of 7.3 meters, 04/30 and 5/1/23. There are few places to park a motorhome in Hondarribia

title: (20280) Hondarribia - 4 Errebellin Kalea
description: Free parking, during the day. Good place to park and visit Hondarribia. Cafeteria and supermarket right in front.

title: (20280) Hondarribia - 3 Bidasoa Ibilbidea
description: dead end facing the sea near the historic center

title: (20280) Hondarribia - 7 Sabin Arana Goiri Kalea
description: Plaça amb 4 taules i bancs de ciment, all in the sun. I also have 8 benches, most of them in the shade, and 2 xarxa water sources. At the coast of the mouth of the Bidasoa river and an extensive free parking area.

title: (64700) Hendaye - 11 Rue Pellot
description: A few slots in front of a car park. Fine for one night. Toilets nearby, near a park and a nature reserve.

title: (20280) Hondarribia - 3 Plaza Muliate
description: One of the few free car parks in Hondarribia, without problems to park, in low season.

title: (20280) Hondarribia - 6 Saindua Kalea
description: Free parking near the center 5 min walk.

title: (20280) Hondarribia - 14 Bidasoa Ibilbidea
description: Parking zone OTA (payment) to visit the center on foot.

name: Restaurante Camping Jaizkibel
title: (20280) Restaurante Camping Jaizkibel
description: Small camping site near Irun called  "Jaizkibel ". Not suitable motorhome >6 m. Very noisy, parcellas are behind the bar.

title: (64700) Hendaye - 15 Quai de la Floride
description: Free parking day and night until June 5.

title: (64700) Hendaye - 5 Rue des Orangers
description: Laundromat used by port people.

title: (20280) Hondarribia - 13A Gabriel Aresti Kalea
description: In the cemetery nearby there are very clean toilets available.

title: (64700) Hendaye -
description: Paid parking from 9h to 19h. WC free and clean. Tarmac area or lawns. Maximum height 2 meters.

title: (20280) Hondarribia -
description: Free toilets with nearby parking. Drinking water fountain next door.

title: (64700) Hendaye - 25 Avenue des Magnolias
description: Paid parking every day, during the day except between 12:30 p.m. and 2 p.m. No prohibition sign at the motorhome or length greater than 5 meters. 5 minutes from the beach and the tourist office, also from the marina.

title: (64700) Hendaye - 62 Avenue des Mimosas
description: Parking

title: (64700) Hendaye - 111bis Boulevard de la Mer
description: Paid parking (parking meter 70 cents for 2 hours in February) along the boulevard de la Mer, beautiful view of the beach and the sea. Ideal for lunch breaks out of season of course.

title: (64700) Hendaye - 105 Boulevard de la Mer
description:
Parking on a small street, no noise despite the proximity to the ideal beach and paying during the day, however, ideal for low season.
Parking prohibited from 01/05 to 31/10

title: (64700) Biriatou - Rue Herri Alde
description: Quiet green parking. A little too steep. For a stop it is not bad.

title: (64700) Hendaye - 97 Boulevard de la Mer
description: Parking allowed, not staying overnight but they don't say anything

title: (64700) Biriatou - 1127 Rue Herri Alde
description: Charming village, parking below the town hall, very quiet. Restaurant in the village but no shop, public toilets. With cc of 6m50 we were able to park like cars. All the tnt tv's were in spanish the radio too.

title: (20280) Hondarribia - 26 GI-3440
description: Car park with ten spaces offering a superb and shaded view of Irun and Hendaye. No service but a few benches for a picnic or a break. A lot of passage during the day, it should be possible to sleep on the spot without problem but it is a little steep, water point on the place not drinkable (watch out for the sign)

title: (64700) Hendaye - 9 Rue Ansoenia
description: Location not attractive. No shade, no electricity, no WC nearby just a small car park saturated in summer and sometimes in winter opposite Hendaye Plage station, with water systems not working! all you have to do is share the 'gens du voyage' area near the fishing port where everything is free for them!

title: (20280) Hondarribia - 27 Barrio Gornutz-Montaña
description: Large flat car park but very dusty and very busy in summer, several picnic tables. Fortress visit at 50 m and lots of hiking and mountain biking. There is a drinking water near the parking lot, next to it a very new (08/2023) outhouse with automatic cleaning and disinfection after each use. We filled up the 5L bottles and put them in our water tank in our RV.

title: (31780) Bera - Río
description: Hondarribia. At the entrance to the car park there is a prohibition sign for vehicles over 5.5m long and 2.2m wide, large vehicles cannot spend the night there. The municipal authorities will send you to the lighthouse. Next to the beach and the marina. At night super quiet. Nearby there are places to have dinner and drinks. Showers on the beach and fountains on the promenade.

title: (64700) Hendaye - 8 Chemin de la Côté
description: Parking spaces along the road max width 2.5m access to the beach 10 min walk

title: (64700) Hendaye - 10 Rue de Saint-Jean de Luz
title_short: (64700) Hendaye - 10 Rue de Saint-Jean de Luz
description: Street perpendicular to the beach promenade. beach access 50 m. Sloping street.

title: (64700) Biriatou - 1320 Chemin de la Forêt
description: Picnic area by the river Bidasoa

title: (20280) Hondarribia - 1W Minatera Ibilbidea
description: Changing rooms, toilets and lockers. From 10 a.m. to 8 p.m. It is accessible from the parking lot and from the beach.

title: (64700) Hendaye - 19 Boulevard de la Mer
description: A lot of parking spaces right by the sea for okay prices. Were there on Sunday morning and had very easy space despite the high season.

title: (20280) Hondarribia - 16D Higer Bidea
description: Parking lot near the beach with access to clean showers (from 10.00 to 20.00) and toilets (9.00 to 20.00). 15/20 min walk to the city center. Usually seems to be paid, but was free in September 2022. Many other campers (small and large) staying peacefully in the spot.

name: Camping Alturan
title: (64700) Camping Alturan
description: Alturan campsite. Very pleasant, shady family campsite.

title: (20280) Hondarribia - 38D Jaitzubia Auzoa
description: This parking is magical, incredible view, walks possible among the horses in freedom. We were 6 vehicles. Very calm night. To recommend without any doubt.

title: (64700) Hendaye - 9 Rue de Pohotenia
description: Classic car park where motorhomes can be put

title: (20280) Hondarribia - Barrio Gornutz-Montaña
description:
Small street with possibility of parking on the edge. The view is worth it, the driveway is very bumpy...
there are horses loose
the passage on the cattle grid is a bit narrow for motorhomes

name: Camping Txoko les 2 Jumeaux
title: (64700) Camping Txoko les 2 Jumeaux
description: Camping 2 very nice twins facing the ocean. We had a car breakdown, the manager graciously saved us! To recommend if you go through! Quality reasonable price.

name: Autocaravan park txingudi
title: (20305) Autocaravan park txingudi
description: Forget the rush and book in advance. Service area and parking for motorhomes guarded 24 hours by video surveillance and security guard. It has 44 places with an approximate area of 25m2 each. All seats have electrical outlet. Drinking water intake, gray and black water discharge point are also offered. Garbage containers (urban waste, plastics, paper and cardboard). Overnight maximum 48 hours. Located in a strategic place close to the municipalities of Hondarribia, San Sebastián, Irun, Biarritz, Bayona..., to discover the character of the Basque people, its history, culture and gastronomy. Place near the border of France, next to the exit of the AP-8. Ideal for users who are passing through to the south of Spain or north of Europe. Point to refuel, rest and continue. Close to excellent hiking trails, stages of the Camino de Santiago, BBT routes. Close to the sea where you can enjoy the beaches and water sports. Perfect to enjoy the sea, the mountains and the city. Book in advance, easy and simple. Rate: €20/24 hours (check in: 12:00 check out 12:00). All included, filling and emptying service and electricity. Rate: €15/24 hours (check in: 12:00 check out 12:00). Including filling and emptying service.

name: Camping Ametza
title: (64700) Camping Ametza
description: Camping Ametza boulevard Emperor Hendaye 64700 located 900 meters from the sandy beach and greenery shaded 5 ha grocery store and bar tennis pool

title: (20303) Irún - Barrio Olaberria
description: A location along the road, not very busy except weekends, for a single vehicle. Grand and breathtaking view. 4G Sosh and Free

title: (31789) Endarlatsa -
description: Parking area for about 8 vans. The terrain is semi-level but without paving. It is not suitable for motorhomes or heavy vehicles. It is a very quiet place that is on the road but hardly any cars pass by. The area has unbeatable views and be aware that there are horses and other loose animals that can pay a visit.

title: (20305) Irun - Barrio Olaberria
description: Parking with superb panoramic view at the entrance of a protected natural site. Cows and horses in freedom, wooden table and barbecue place nearby immediate. Starting point for hiking. Quiet in October.

title: (64700) Hendaye - 9 Rue Gasconenia
description: Free one-way roadside parking without prohibitions and beside a campsite, the upper part is flat, at the beginning it is uphill, during the day there are cars, park well on the right because they pass also coach, access to the beach in 5' and to Hendaye in 20'. On the beach there is also a van with sandwiches and drinks

title: (20280) Hondarribia - GI-3440
description: Place next to the road although quiet. There are shaded areas that are level and one that is not. There are 2 quite beautiful trails to start, you pass by the horse side and it is allowed with dogs. We have only stopped during the day, although you can stay overnight.

title: (20280) Fuenterrabía - 43 Barrio Gornutz-Montaña
description: Water fountain. Same water as the City. Very good.

title: (64700) Hendaye - 6 Rue d'Armatonde
description: Ample parking, without height limitation, without services. dead end street with very little traffic.

title: (20280) Hondarribia - Ramon Iribarren Pasealekua Ibilbidea
description: Parking Lurgorri, next to the Hondarribia beach. You can hear some cars going by on the road, but it's not too disturbing and I had a quiet night.

title: (20303) Irun - 127 Barrio Olaberria
description: Parking of the pass. At the edge of the road. Starting point for Haya Penas. No service. Calm. Frequented by hikers. Useful wedges. Beautiful forest environment.

title: (20280) Hondarribia - 45 Barrio Gornutz
description: Parking under the trees in front of the shooting range

title: (20100) Lezo - 27 Gaintxurizketa Goikoa Bailara
description: Sloping parking lot with nice noise view in the valley of cars

title: (20280) Hondarribia - 43Y Lugar Gornutz
description: Super quiet spot under a tree just after the shooting range with a magnificent view of Hondarribia and Hendaye. Small road with very little traffic.

title: (20280) Hondarribia - 42 Barrio Gornutz-Montaña
description: Small nice place at the top of the hill overlooking Irun, its beaches and harbor, some places available, and not accessible to the big camper because very narrow road

title: (20280) Hondarribia - GI-3440
description: For a little lunch break with a breathtaking view of the ocean. The road is right next to it but people drive slowly and it is not very busy. Ideal for a lunch break.

title: (20180) - 1 Maldaburu Bidea
description: Rest area with plenty of parking space. There are parking lots for trucks, and cars and trailers are close to the autogrill. They have showers and bathrooms, but they close at midnight.

title: (20280) Hondarribia - 48 Higer Bidea
description: Beautiful view of the sea, a slightly narrow path leads from the road up to this place

title: (20280) Hondarribia - 40 Barrio Gornutz-Montaña
description: Nice place, little off-road to get there. We were there because the park spot was a little further for us to do. Beautiful view and all alone. No overnight stays!

title: (20180) - Pikogarate Bidea
description: There is plenty of parking at the side of this road. It is wonderful. The road is not busy. This place might not be good if it's very windy and there's only a shady spot. Cows Roaming There is a bit of a ledge sticking out, so watch out if you're really thrown

title: (20280) Hondarribia - 27-29 Ramon Iribarren Pasealekua Ibilbidea
description: Parking on the quays at the fishing port with its trawlers typical of the region! Very pleasant ! Overnight stays are prohibited.

title: (20280) Hondarribia - GI-3440
description: Roadside parking ideal for a night with its magnificent life at sunset ☀

title: (20180) Pikoketa - Pikogarate Bidea
description: The place is on the road with little traffic. No cars at night. Beautiful view. A restaurant is located above about 10 minutes on foot.

title: (64700) Hendaye - 2 Chemin de Ascoube Fagady
description: Small wooded parking limited to 2 m, ideal for the night, slightly noisy because passage of the cornice.

title: (20280) - 932 Camino Higer
description: Parking for the night

title: (20280) Hondarribia - 56A Higer Bidea
description: Parking 2 small restaurants to visit the lighthouse area, after a small hike / de-escalation you can even go to a very small cove on the left to swim!

name: Camping Eskualduna
title: (64700) Camping Eskualduna
description: Camping Eskuaduna **** the campers are installed outside the campsite, quiet and shaded with electricity. The wedges are mandatory on grass, June 11, 2018: place on grass impractical (too wet): we are on tarmac, sloping. Everything is closed, the restaurant, the store, the pool, the shuttle to the beach. It's the same price though.

title: (20280) - 56X Camino Higer
description: Spot on tar in the middle of nature. Road that seems a bit winding to get there but ultimately quite easy. Located right next to a good restaurant with a view.

name: Faro de Higuer Kanpina
title: (20280) Faro de Higuer Kanpina
description: Hondarribia, 58 Higer Bidea. Small nice campsite with beautiful view, 38 euros per night for 2 with electricity. Speak French and English at the reception.

name: Camping De La Corniche
title: (64122) Camping De La Corniche
description: Camping Corniche **** in Hendaye. Camping with a very good value for money. Extra pool. Animations. Sanitary ok. Free shuttle bus every 30 minutes to the large family beach of fine sand Hendaye. The campsite runs along the path of the natural site of Abbadia. Access to a cove only in the world. Shop. Restaurant. Bike rental. Nice home. Bar open until 2am.

title: (64122) Urrugne - 1295-1363 Route du Filtre
description: Coastal view. Very narrow access road with a very steep slope. Warning ! You have to park in the immediate vicinity of the road because parking on the grass is prohibited by law. It is considered a natural space (L.362-1 of the environment code). Access prohibited to the camper because of the narrowness of the road.

title: (20110) Pasaia - 9 Jaizkibel Hiribidea
description: Parking in a quiet street. Almost uniform. Almost 400 meters high.

title: (20180) Ergoien - 1 Arditurri Bidea
description: Gravel area on the edge of the road, next to the river. Space for one, although a little further on there is a parking lot.

name: Camping Aire Ona
title: (64122) Camping Aire Ona
description: Camping Aire Ona. Two-star campsite. Very well received at 20h50 without reservation. Sanitary very clean. I advise.

title: (31770) Endarlatsa - 2004 Caserio Etxetxuri
description: Place next to the river, with different spaces where you can park the bridge on the right, you can access the river to take a bath but not to park as this prevents the exit of the houses to sleep enjoy the spaces next to the road, quiet place

name: Camping Oliden
title: (20180) Camping Oliden
description: Super small camping on grass with shade, a nice small pool, beautiful sanitary very clean Well defined locations Friendly home

title: (64122) Urrugne - 32 Rue Notre Dame de Socorri
title_short: (64122) Urrugne - 32 Rue Notre Dame de Socorri
description: OK except 1.4-1.10 from the municipal stop Quiet parking and exceptional view, Next to the small chapel.

title: (20100) Lezo - 47 Ipintza Kalea
description: Cheap gas station, free water refill, shower

title: (20180) Oyarzun - 20 Lesakako Bidea
description: Campa next to the road in unpaved area with potholes.

title: (64122) Urrugne -
description: Close to the golf practitioner. Close to the road, you have to be at the end of the parking lot to make the noise of the cars less audible..no height limit. Extraordinary viewpoint and walk along the corniche.

title: (20180) - 22 Lesakako Bidea
description: Apparently from the hostel but also tourist information, it is allowed to spend the night in the path of the parking lot. If there are problems staying overnight, there is a parking lot on the other side of the tunnel. And a field 300 meters before the hostel.

title: (64122) Urrugne - 14 Rue Notre Dame de Socorri
title_short: (64122) Urrugne - 14 Rue Notre Dame de Socorri
description: Only for small campers. Ideal to visit the town center.

title: (20180) Altzibar-Karrika - 2Y Altzibar Poligonoa
description: Parking next to a stream, in a neighborhood with shops, bar, restaurant ..... quiet place with places to walk. Pass the bidegorri right next to it.

title: (20180) Elizalde - 4A Sibeluts Kalea
description: Large parking next to the cemetery. Green areas to walk.

title: (20180) Oiartzun - 3 Lintzirin Poligonoa Poligonoa
description: Repsol service station with paid showers with car wash also for campers, you can also wash the roof, well-cleaned service station toilets and the possibility of filling up water (not drinkable).

title: (64122) Urrugne - Autoroute de la Côte Basque
title_short: (64122) Urrugne - Autoroute de la Côte Basque
description: The parking is big. There is a toilet and water

title: (64122) Urrugne - 1 Place Antoine d'Abbadie
description: Good parking lot to visit the town center. Only suitable for small campers.

name: Camping-caravaning Mendi Azpian
title: (64122) Camping-caravaning Mendi Azpian
description: Camping-caravanning "Mendi Azpian ***" which takes the camper vans, nice shady, very close to services and the Spanish border.

title: (31770) Auzoberri -
description: Flat space in a curve for 2 vehicles. Very quiet, only cowbells in the distance. Views of the mountains and the sea in the distance. Slightly steep approach via gravel road for campers may not be suitable. It was still doable with our Passat front-wheel drive.

title: (20180) Oiartzun - 910 Uretxe Poligonoa
description: Parking well located to visit Errenteria. To sleep there are other places nearby quieter.

title: (64122) Urrugne - 4 Rue Iturri Luxea
description: Parking spaces along a small river with picnic tables. No service. No prohibition. For one night only.

title: (64122) Urrugne - 4 Place de Sulzbach
description: Playground without table but with lots of shade

title: (64122) Urrugne - 6 Rue d'Urtubie
description: Inside the Town, a quiet place at night, it is advisable to occupy it late in the afternoon-night to spend the night without attracting attention and leave in the morning.

title: (64122) Urrugne - 1 Chemin de la Douane
description: Good for a night in retreat when the areas nearby are full. On the edge of a busy road until 8 p.m. and from 8:15 a.m., but very quiet after dark.

title: (64122) Urrugne - 3788-3812 Route d'Ibardin
description: Large parking lot at the edge of a stream with the start of a hike to the Ibardin pass.

title: (31780) Bera - 40C Elzaurdia Auzoa
description: Col d'Ibardin (at the very top) magnificent viewpoint overlooking the bay of Saint Jean de Luz with a direct view of the Rhune at 905 m. You can sleep for an hour where there is quite a location 500 meters below. The goalkeeper's Road culminates with his 4 * 4 and dislodges campers who would risk it. We went to sleep lower, I went up in the morning to have breakfast with coffee on this magnificent spectacle above the clouds and with the sound of the bells of the cows of the horses grazing right next to them, magic.

title: (31770) Navarra - 2088 Caserio Agiña
description: Very large parking lot allowing to install several vehicles. Proximity to hiking departures and magnificent viewpoints. No services.

name: Camping Sunêlia COL D'IBARDIN
title: (64122) Camping Sunêlia COL D'IBARDIN
description: Camping Sunelia du Col d’Ibardin.  Huge camping**** well located close to Saint Jean de Luz and the spanish shopping spot. Stunning place under big old oak trees, cross by a small river. Great services and very good restaurant. We recommand!

title: (31780) Bera - Elzaurdia Auzoa
description: The campground area being full, the caretaker at 9 pm drove us to this roadside parking but no vehicle passing at night. Provide shims possibly depending on the location.

title: (20100) Lezo -
description: Small place, for a van. The part on the right is flat, on the left it is rocky and uneven. You can maneuver inside, but it's better if you go in from behind. No services.

title: (20180) Oiartzun - 5 Talaia Poligonoa Poligonoa
description: Parking in the polygon next to a river with a promenade and a greenway. It also has a picnic area. Peaceful place

title: (31770) Auzoberri -
description: Nice point in the shade to spend the night in the middle of nature. The place has space for several vans and is equipped with garbage containers right at the entrance. There are wild horses that may come within a few meters but do nothing. I strongly advise against taking the concrete road that starts at that point to continue your path, whatever it may be, even if Google Maps indicates it.

title: (64122) Urrugne -
description: Pretty little spot slightly set back from the road. No noise when inside. in the middle of the trees. we found the land flat near the trash can but a little sloping. we couldn't find anything better in the area. we recommend

title: (20110) Gipuzkoa - 7W Lugar Jaizkibelbidea
description: Small gravel parking next to the road; view on sheep, donkeys, horses and a small pico nearby. Very quiet and clean.

title: (64122) Urrugne - 561 Route d'Herboure
description: Wooded place and at the edge of a borrowed road with neighborhood of houses but very pleasant, large surface and almost flat: we have neighbors Cc converted van like us or very nice van

name: Camping Untxin Socoa
title: (64122) Camping Untxin Socoa
description: IDEM Camping UNTXIN 135 Handiabaita Road! Camping with location for camper. Great shady location. Well located, lidl, bakery, restaurant, not far, the corniche 15 minutes walk.

title: (31780) Bera - Carretera de Francia
description: At the Ibardin pass, at the exit of Avia station.

title: (31770) Lesaka - Carretera de Aritxulegi
description: Places in nature. Wake up in the early morning leaves wild hair. Only for van because very narrow road

name: Camping Larouletta
title: (64122) Camping Larouletta
description: Camping Larouletta with emptying, toilet and gray water, clean water and electricity, open all year with heated pool even arriving at night we ask and we pay the next day.

title: (64122) Urrugne - 7298-7382 Route d'Ibardin
description: Parking at Ibardin Pass on the Spanish border with shops and pretty mountain setting

title: (20100) Lezo -
description: Free day and night parking along and at the end of the dead end, quiet corner

name: Camping Suhiberry
title: (64122) Camping Suhiberry
description: Your camping caravan site at the Basque Country SUHIBERRY campsite, sunny or in the shade of oaks and poplars, is by nature authentic accommodation suitable for holidays with family and friends. Reserve among the 113 free plots (out of 168 in total), all grass, delimited by hedges and arranged on a terrace for your privacy. In our inexpensive Basque Country campsite, three sanitary blocks well distributed throughout the campsite to best serve all guests, with a team highly aware, like everyone else, of respecting the cleanliness of the premises; we do everything to be irreproachable when it comes to sanitary hygiene.

title: (20100) Lezo - GI 2638
description:
Not very picturesque, no services, but free and rather calm. Occasionally there is noise from the nearby trains, but ut didn't bother us. 
It's a good base to sleep and leave the car and go for a hike.

title: (31770) Lesaca - Carretera de Aritxulegi
description: * for van and camper * mountain view * very quiet, * activities, hiking, mountain biking * no service, flat parking. * Take the concrete path at the top, starting with the walks. !!! Reminder, advice for nature lovers, thank you for leaving all the waste, including toilet paper, to preserve this beautiful site.

title: (20100) Errenteria - 51 Lousada Kalea
description: We spent a night without problems and quiet and that was the parties of Errenteria.  It's a bit far from the center on the way out, it's all downhill… the return is a little harder hehe.

title: (64122) Urrugne - 9 Rue Poutillenea
description:
At the end of AldI parking. Clean place to stay.
We stay there with two other campings for two nights. There is a small path to the river which will get you to the beach. very nice neighbourhood. Please be quit at night, the parking is next to a old people home. Keep it clean, we saw a couple of locals comming taking a look if we keep every thing clean. During our stay there where arround 6 campers. 
Place has to entrance. one has a height limit of 2.2 m

title: (31789) Xantelerreka - 20AA Eltzaurdia Auzoa
description: Free motorhome parking ideal for shopping at the border against a full tank of diesel at the service station emptying and full of free water

title: (31780) Bera - Carretera de Ibardin
description: Quiet, spacious and in the middle of nature. With 5 picnic tables and a waste point.

title: (20110) Pasaia - Bonanza Ibilbidea
description: At the intersection of the road and a path. Small flat place to spend the night. 2/3 places, no service, quiet and in the shade of pines. Parking further for garbage cans. Possibility of going down to the port of Pasajes by the paths.

title: (64122) Urrugne -
description: Public parking without height limitation

title: (31780) Bera -
description: 1 petit emplacement le long d'un chemin forestier. Calm, accessible aux vans.

name: Camping Juantcho
title: (64122) Camping Juantcho
description: Campsite Juantcho **. Very friendly reception. Very nice and large shady pitches (<100 m2) and very quiet, 50 m from the Corniche. 500m only to town center and beach with private path. Food truck with breakfast, lunch and dinner always fresh from the local market.

title: (64122) Urrugne - 15 Chemin de Mentaberri
description: Parking of the school of Oleta (commune of Urrugne). View of the Rhune, very quiet, almost flat. Water point and garbage cans nearby, 2 picnic tables, a bench and a ping pong table hard

title: (64500) Ciboure - 17 Avenue Kattalin Aguirre
description: Quiet, street-side parking spaces. Ideal for visiting Saint Jean de Luz, Ciboure and Socoa. Do not be fooled by the photo, there is room, that day there was a garage sale nearby.

title: (64122) Urrugne - 139-159 Route Nationale 10
description: Daily parking lot only. On the Leclerc car park, at the end of the car park before service station. 7 places reserved for motorhomes. convenient ! No service.

title: (64122) Urrugne - 2-282 Chemin de Inzola
description: Parking at the disposal of the hikers, departure for several walks of the mountain of Ciboure and Rhune. Very beautiful point of view at the top of La Rhune. Ideal for one or two nights including day. Super quiet, quiet frequented only by hikers very family. Park next to the Chapel in length on the large parking space along the Chapel. Totally Free.

title: (31780) Bera - Unnamed Road
description: View of the Rhune, to the sound of cow bells.

title: (64122) Urrugne - 3 Rue de l'Untxin
description: Small parking of a residence, calm and sheltered from the wind. Toilets next to the park for children.

title: (64122) Urrugne - 21 Rue de Socoa
description: Small roadside parking for Vans

title: (64122) Urrugne - 8A Rue de l'Untxin
description: Parking, bar, tobacconist, bakery, grocery store, ticket dispenser.

title: (20110) Pasaia - 3 Arrokaundieta Bidea
description: Shaded picnic area with tables and benches, and small walking paths

title: (64500) Ciboure - 13 Chemin de l'Untxin
description: Quiet parking night and day. Many stores around.

title: (20110) Pasai Donibane - 9W Donibaneko Pasealekua
description: Good place to leave the motorhome, visit the old part of Donibane, go to San Pedro by boat.

title: (20110) Pasai Donibane - 1 Ámbito Portuario Kalea
description: Nice parking for motorhomes and large vans. Close to Pasaia. Right next to the port. In the evening it was really quiet, from morning there are cars coming down the street. It is very urban, there is no grass etc. but helps for the day/night. In the night it felt safe.

title: (20110) Pasai Donibane - 3 Jose Joakin Otaegui Plaza
title_short: (20110) Pasai Donibane - 3 Jose Joakin Otaegui Plaza
description: Water fountain in the pediment, located on the side of the track.

title: (64500) Ciboure - 49 Boulevard Pierre Benoît
description: Perfect spot (for New Years Eve, Christmas night and day) overlooking the bay of Saint-Jean de Luz and in the distance, the view of Biarritz. In my opinion, impossible to park in season, but in winter, it is a magical place! No CC prohibition sign. Below the road and quiet (at this time) just the sound of wind and waves.

title: (31789) Xantelerreka - 14AA Eltzaurdia Auzoa
description: Accessible by 4x4 vehicle or substantial ground clearance, next to a hunting shelter. Please note that not all nearby paths are open to 4x4s.

title: (20110) Pasai Donibane - 2 Lezo-Bide Kalea
description: Parking very quiet above the port and 5 minutes walk from the old town and bars restaurants. Is located in the middle of the coastal hike that goes from Hondarribia to San Seb. A river shuttle provides access to the other side. Not suitable for vehicles over 6m long.

title: (64122) Urrugne - 405 Chemin d'Ascain
description: Here, it is a small corner, along a small and quite quiet road, with a view of Rhune on one side and pylons on the other. Otherwise the terrain is flat.

title: (64500) Ciboure - D912
description: Parking by the sea, condemned payment terminals, noisy in the evening and morning, but quiet night (12/30/19) at the sound of the waves. No motorhome prohibition sign, RAS municipal police. The neighbors above very calm too? So at this time No problem

title: (64500) Ciboure - 10 Rue de la Tour
description: Small car park at the foot of the tower with fountain. residential area, but we were made to understand that it was not a campsite . so don't go on too long..

title: (64500) Ciboure - 1 Avenue de l'Océan
description: Rising street not paying at night until 9 am, nice view of the beach, be careful, on a slope.

title: (64310) Ascain - Chemin de Xurien Borda
description: Departure hiking trail for the Rhune. Complete from 8 a.m. and maneuvers made difficult or even impossible by parking vehicles.

title: (20180) Oiartzun - GI-3631
description: Small parking lot, for van and van. 4G Sosh

title: (20100) Errenteria - GI-3671
description: Roadside parking without height restriction. Didn't spend the night but saw many vans parked there.

title: (31780) Bera - 9A Eztegara Pasealekua
description: Bera Bidasoa, parking behind the cultural center. Forbidden to motorhomes

title: (64500) Ciboure - 39 Avenue Jean Jaurès
description: Small parking lot of 2 places! No sign of contraindications to park a motorhome! Not annoying!

title: (64500) Ciboure - 8 Rue Simone Ménez
description: Parking with narrow access.

title: (64500) Ciboure - 65 Square de la Victoire
description: Parking next to the port, with a small beach, a bit noisy because it is close to the road but you can sleep well. 10 minutes walk from Saint Jean de Luz and free from 19:30 to 09:00. With public sanitary facilities

title: (64500) Ciboure - 32 Rue François Turnaco
description: Kindergarten parking: free and barrier-free, a little way off the road. 15mn maximum of the city center and the port. We spent a peaceful night in 2.80 high and 6 meters long) and enjoyed ST Jean de Luz the next day? only outside school period of course!

title: (64500) Ciboure - 17 Place de la Tour d'Auvergne
title_short: (64500) Ciboure - 17 Place de la Tour d'Auvergne
description: Laundromat

title: (20100) Errenteria - San Marko Gunea Aldea
description: Parking Fort San Marko. Places of the horizontal bottom, on sites in grass Nothing indicates that it is prohibited at night. By obvious to find because roads are closed to traffic: take GI 3671. It goes quite steep and it is not very wide. The fort is visited in summer and it's free beautiful view. A light background noise with the San Sebastian highway in the distance (far enough). Toilet (very clean) and wifi in the fort. Chestnut trees all around the fort :-)

title: (20017) Donostia-San Sebastian - 922 Darieta Bidea
description: Public car park (flat), next to the new Alza Sports Center. ONLY OVERNIGHT. Suitable for minicampers and small cars. 2m height limit. It is not usually crowded. Lamps around but with the blinders, solved. Trash cans nearby. Views of Peñas de Aia, San Marcos and surrounding mountains. The best, the sunrises.

title: (20180) - GI-3631
description: Outdoor parking with departures for hikes and possible take-off for paragliders. A little more exposed to the winds than the previous parking lot on the same road. Very nice view of San Sebastian with sunset. Several flocks of sheep around which woke us up in the early morning.

title: (64500) Ciboure - 30 Rue Arnaud Massy
description: Parking spaces along a road (in front of a playground)

title: (64500) Ciboure - 2 Allée Zaldi Xurito
description: About ten free places in front of the cemetery. Rather noisy road alongside and sloping parking lot. Access to running water and toilet from the cemetery.

title: (31780) Bera - 12A Matzada Karrika
description: Parking day and night, without services and five minutes from the town center.

title: (20110) Pasaia - 102 Esnabide Kalea
description: Street leading to "San Pedro de Pasaia" free parking on one side of the street or parking port, not bad passage of pedestrians, cars and trucks but in the night much less passage, I advise you to go visit the old town to the mouth of the port is beautiful. restaurants, bars, boardwalk, hiking, fishing, wooden boat building visit at the end of the promenade, possibility to cross the harbor by boat for round trip to visit a beautiful place in front, "Pasai Donibane "superb view in the heights, shady corners etc ... water point on the square (city side), children's playground, restaurants, banks, bars, bakeries and small supermarket" Dia "The photos come from the promenade of port and his little boat that makes us cross.

title: (20100) Errenteria - San Marco Gunea Aldea
description: Little spot below the parking of San Marko castle, in case that one gets too crowded

title: (64500) Ciboure - 1 Rue Arnaud Massy
description: Small car park with a few spaces. Quiet. A traffic sign prohibiting parking but on the sidewalk. Nothing indicates the prohibition of CC. We parked without problem in low season (early November) with a converted van. To be avoided for large CCs.

title: (64500) Saint-Jean-de-Luz - Pont Charles de Gaulle
description:
Not a very pleasant area because it is sandwiched between the train track and a busy road, but still very well located to visit San Juan de Luz, very narrow places, especially for large motorhomes, 48 hours maximum. Light terminal was removed (at the request of the city council).

The rate for 24h is:
Until 31/3: €4
From 1/4 to 31/10: €6.

title: (64500) Saint-Jean-de-Luz - 3 Avenue Pierre Larramendy
description: Paid parking along this long avenue. No camper ban. Downtown at 8 mn.

title: (20180) - Camino Artikutzako
description: Perfect parking for a picnic with views of the mountains and meeting with wild horses, cows.

title: (20110) Pasaia - Ámbito Portuario Kalea
description: Ample parking for all types of vehicles. Next to the port. Is free. We have slept two nights without problems and without noise. No shade and asphalt floor. Overnight is allowed but not camping. San Pedro neighborhood and near San Juan neighborhood.

title: (64500) Saint-Jean-de-Luz - 4 Avenue du Professeur Gregorio Marañon
title_short: (64500) Saint-Jean-de-Luz - 4 Avenue du Professeur Gregorio Marañon
description: Parking next to the station car park, long quiet avenue, near the center. Part limited in height.
